## Process Macro Models

```{r}
require(semMediation)
no=nrow(pmacro)
```
Curretly, `r no` process macro models are supported. Supported models are as follows.

```{r}
for(i in 1:no){
    
    cat("Model",pmacro$no[i],"\n")
    pmacroModel(pmacro$no[i])
}
```
